description:
It’s time for Kuroyanagi to decide who will win the sixth round: Kazuma or Norihei. Kuroyanagi delivers his most expressive reactions yet in a battle that leaves Kazuma and the others stunned!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Classic Taste! One Heart That Loves Japan!
Dentou no Aji!! Nippon o Omou Kokoro wa Hitotsu!
Goût traditionnel ! Le Japon est dans nos cœurs !
รสชาติต้นตำรับ!! จิตใจที่คำนึงถึงญี่ปุ่นมีหนึ่งเดียว
伝統の味!! 日本を想うココロはひとつ!
